# dp-dl

### Instagram DP Downloader:

> A Python module to download DP of Instagram  
> Profiles in the best quality possible

#### __Prerequisites__

> python>=3

#### __Requirements__

Modules|
:---:|
request|
bs4|

#### How to :

```
pip install igdp-dl
dp-dl --username [USERNAME HERE] --output [FOLDERNAME/ HERE](optional)
```
